website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and compact option that is well-suited for light gardening and camping needs.
pros: Features a forged 1.4-pound head and a 14-inch rubberized fiberglass handle
Lighter and shorter than a traditional pick axe
cons: A few users say the balance of this pick axe is a bit off

customer_reviews.title: A good tool to have in the garden!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed to dislodge those buried rocks in my garden. Exactly as described and easy to assemble and use. I like the fact that the handle is unbreakable and does not rot. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Carl S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy duty yard work
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest I wasn't sure what to expect but I did believe I would get something larger than a over sized ice pick. We'll see what it's capable of. TBC UPDATE I finally had a opportunity to use this. I must say it's a nice little tool. I still don't think it's up to really heavy duty projects but am pleasantly surprised at what the tool is capable of for it's size. So unless you're trying to remove heavy stones or something that is buried on the deep side this tool will do. Would still like it better if it had a little more heft to it
customer_reviews.author: MADDY ANN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any digging and easy to use for 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Nicely weighted and strong to get through my yard of rocks carefully enough to not damage sprinkler lines and low voltage wires underground. Lightweight for my 10 year old to dig and "play" Minecraft and mining in the yard as well. I bought it for him, but very useful for me so i need to ask him to borrow it whenever I need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: eighty7

customer_reviews.title: a little instruction on assembly would be nice
customer_reviews.text: There aren't many ways to assemble this mattock arrived in two pieces. However, it took a few attempts to assemble it before I realized I was doing it incorrectly. If I were the manufacturer, I would include a one-sentence guide to assemble. I like the Knights Of Armur Weeding Mattock because it is of modest size, but does penetrate the clay soil better than a shovel or hoe. Overall, I'm very please with it.
customer_reviews.author: CoconutPalmTree

customer_reviews.title: Great gardening tool-all purpose
customer_reviews.text: For the individual that needs instructions for assembling-needs help It’s a 50/50 only two pieces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite garden tools.
customer_reviews.text: I use this tool all the time. I break up heavy clay soil, get holes started (and sometimes completed), dig up roots and other things. Sometimes I use it as a lever to loosen or pry up plants that are stubborn. I had a full size mattock but as I got older it was too heavy and unwieldy to handle. I like this one fine.
customer_reviews.author: Houston gardener

customer_reviews.title: Great little sledge pick and hoe!!
customer_reviews.text: This little sledge pick and hoe is ideal for carving out stone and rock in a garden and also to provide holes in tough terrain to set your foot in if you are climbing rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Flex

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Dang, how have I gone all of my life without one of these? It is totally awesome! It’s well made, very sturdy and easy to use. It has become my go-to yard tool.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Wall

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, a little oddly balanced. It does the job at an ok price.
customer_reviews.author: Tell-It-Like-It-Is

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, size, weight & sturdiness for me; as an older woman doing yard work.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Yard Tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this for weeding when there are lots of roots, and many other uses around the yard. My landscaper let me borrow his and I fell in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great for yard ,love the color neon . Husband loved it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: The perfect tool for gardening. Breaks up the soil and creates places for new plants with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly Cruiser

product_meta.title: Knights Of Armur Weeding Mattock Hoe, Pick Axe 15-Inch, One Piece Intact Drop Forged, Plastic Coated Fiberglass Handle, 1.4LB
product_meta.description: One-Piece Intact Dorp Forged. Heat treated and tempered providing high strength and durability. Beveled Cutting Edge. Professional Strong and Comfort Rubberized Fiberglass Handle. Slip-on eye pattern for easy assembly and disassembly Adze hoe and pick. Cutting edge 1.57"(4cm). Versatile use and multi-purpose: rooter, weeder, breaking up compacted soil Product Dimentions: Head weight: 0.9lbs(380-400g) marked "400"; Head length:9.6"(24.5cm); Handle length:15inches(38cm); Product total weight: 1.4lbs (640g) Ideal for gardening, prospecting and camping
